TopicTitle: Anyone like to play "Space Agency" android game, it like KSP

Articles.Content:
Ann it's no easy as people might think, have problem with docking, the same think i had problem in KSP that love/hate relationship, that you must ideally algin you ship with docking ports  

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nooleus.android.spaceagency
I don't like it because of its inaccurate orbital mechanics. Lime, if you are going to do orbits do it right!
Tried it, completed all missions, ran out of battery, uninstalled. Good for five minutes, not much more. Same as SimpleRockets.
download space flight simulator from google app store, it almost feels like a 2d rip off of KSP
